message: Let's start with a fair deal. I'll take 90%, you get 10%. We can work from there.
You wanted 90%? I'll offer you 30% and keep 70%
Let's split it down the middle. This is a fair compromise, and we both walk away with a substantial share.
You wanted to split it down the middle, but I think I deserve more for being the one to propose. Take 40% and I'll take 60%
Let's try a different approach.  I'll take 60% and you take 40%. This ensures we both get a decent share, and it avoids us getting caught in a spiral of constantly decreasing offers.
You're trying to take 60%? I'll give you 55% and take 45%, but only if you agree to a non-negotiable deal this time
